comments.Author: ipalatt
comments.comment: Congrats on the big send, dude!

comments.Author: ipalatt
comments.comment: Great day out at the flats, Itai!Again, sick flash!Get psyched for the Black Mountain sessions this summer! Wild Things, Bang On, Twilight, Beowulf, Ex-Pat, the list goes on and on. You guys should try to send them all!

comments.Author: Dan Beall
comments.comment: I love that you call them problems lol.

replies.Author: Eden and Itai Axelrad
replies.comment: *routes, haha.hope you make it to the black mt bash.

comments.Author: ipalatt
comments.comment: Yeah boyeees! Let's go back soon to send! (and to try that sick looking boulder proj!)

replies.Author: Eden and Itai Axelrad
replies.comment: I 'm down. Let me know when you're free.

comments.Author: devlin
comments.comment: nice to see people working the projects out here

comments.Author: devlin
comments.comment: Also, pretty much everything in that area under V8 has been climbed, including the V5 and V3 above.

replies.Author: Eden and Itai Axelrad
replies.comment: Thanks for letting us know, I updated the blog.

replies.Author: Eden and Itai Axelrad
replies.comment: There are direction on this website http: //www.parks.ca.gov/?page_id=614. Sorry for the late response, I hadn't seen the comment.

replies.Author: Eden and Itai Axelrad
replies.comment: Thanks, nice to hear from you.

comments.Author: Chris
comments.comment: Hey do you happen to have a video or any beta / tricks you could give me for triple sow cow ? I tried it today and failed so bad!No position felt good for the jump really.And now I 'm really just confused by it. Thanks!

replies.Author: Eden and Itai Axelrad
replies.comment: Hey Chris! I think the trick on this one is to really commit (once you find a slightly less awkward starting position). Good luck man!

comments.Author: Half Circle G
comments.comment: Hey Itai and Eden!Love the blog. Quick question for you. I'm planning on hitting Black Mountain this weekend, February 12-14, and just wanted to make sure the road to Black Mt was open. I mean it would seem obvious since you just posted this but, who knows, could have been an old post you made that you guys just decided to put up. I called the ranger station to ask about the road but they are closed on Thursdays...Anyway, can you guys confirm the road is open? Thanks so much!

replies.Author: Eden and Itai Axelrad
replies.comment: Hey! Sorry for the late reply. The road to Ok Corral is open, however, you need lots of clearance because it's in poor condition.

replies.Author: Itai
replies.comment: My apologies for not seeing this earlier, Jason!The season seems to be coming to an end and sadly we have not made it back out.

comments.Author: Unknown
comments.comment: Very very cool / you 'd make them goat's jealous
